about_the_game:
A fast-paced strategy game of fantasy biology. Start with a single fragile cell and expand across the network, assimilating rivals to grow your gel-powered army. Evolve mutations, unlock new abilities, and outmaneuver deadly pathogens. Adapt and conquer, expand or be consumed. Every decision shapes the network — will you achieve total domination?

Intuitive yet Demanding:

Transferring gel is simple enough. But where and when you do it, makes all the difference. Time your actions, observing the competing cells' behavior.

Over 80 Hand Crafted Missions:

Structured into four campaigns, all missions have been designed with pen and paper to offer a diverse set of challenges, requiring you to adapt and learn new strategies. Some are more action-driven, some more puzzle-like.

A Variety of Game Modes:

Win conditions augment the play style of each mission. Fast-paced skirmish fights, survival mode until the timer runs out, or being the first to assimilate a target cells, are just some of the examples.

The Lab - Bio-engineer Your Arsenal:

The Lab provides you with tools to develop new mutations, nanoboosts, catalyst upgrades.

Specialized Cells:

Some cells provide distinct advantages while others can be just liabilities. Expand your network strategically to be the first to assimilate the best cells.

Advanced Tools for Hardcore Players:

Experience-enhancing functionality is available for power users, such as Continuous Send, Chain Linking and the Passive/Aggressive toggle. Cell information panels provide insight to the raw numbers driving the simulation.

Adjustable Difficulty Setting:

Challenges too hard? You can lower the simulation temperature to have an easier time, but the rewards will not be as good. The game also provides short video tutorials.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Orbicorp Mission Statement

Below is the standard issue onboarding letter.

Welcome, doctor, to the Gelluloid Labs micro-life research program. We are Orbicorp, leaders in bio-tech and DNA disease analysis.

We study alien life forms to enhance our medical expertise with fascinating knowledge of new cellular behaviors.

Our vow is to not only heal the sick -- but go beyond that and super-charge biological functions in all humans, ensuring our race continues to dominate the known galaxies.

By injecting a special type of Gel under strict laboratory conditions, we are able to study how these extraordinary alien tissues work to endure the extreme, life-threatening conditions of the far away solar systems.

Our newest research produced the Green Gel, a new type of gel that can be controlled by hardware buttons and that can be seen through the microscope.

As a scientist, you are trained to complete these experiments. Your reward will be in the form of Research Points which you can spend developing new technologies in the Lab.

.

Thank you for reading this job description. Should you choose to apply for the position, your findings in Gelluloid Labs will lead to great advancements in human medicine and biological enhancements - sometime in the years to come.

A beautiful and serene Lab is made at your disposal by Orbicorp for free: *

* For the duration of your experiments. Orbicorp may terminate your contract without prior notice, and have a new scientist move in. The Lab is expensive to run and we can't waste any time or money. Or both!

We sincerely admire your devotion. We can't wait to see your research, which will lead to human domination in the known galaxies.

The CEO of Orbicorp himself,

TAMN GHONTJEN JR.

name: Gelluloid Domination

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5™ series or AMD® Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD® Radeon™ RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7™ series or AMD® Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD® Radeon™ RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Gelluloid Domination is a fast-paced, strategic and tactical game where you grow a network of cells. Expand by assimilating nearby cells, fight off pathogens and develop nanoboosts in the lab. Other cells want to propagate their DNA too, so this won't be easy. Can your cells achieve domination?
